Title: Hammer to Fall
Description:
It looks like the Horde thinks they can hide behind their heavy hitting mooks.

The mooks are tough, powerful, and dumber than an ogre with a hangover.

Go down there and bring the hammer of the Alliance fury down on them!
RewardText: Thank you soldier. That should teach the Horde that it will take more than a couple of mooks to scare us away.
